description: Ultra soft premium beanie made in Europe. This beanie is the perfect accessory to pack for all your next outdoor adventure.<br><br>We use RWS certified 100% 19,5 micron extra fine merino wool in a 2-layer lightweight knitted construction because merino wool is warm, soft on the skin and is anti-odor and temperature regulating. The inside is fully fleece lined with polyester for ultra soft warmth and wind protection. This beanie has a regular fit.
name: /29 Light Merinoull Beanie
